member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Utilities.IDateTimeProvider
member.summary: Defines methods which returns the current date and time.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Utilities.IDateTimeProvider.Now
member.summary: Returns the current date and time.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Utilities.IDateTimeProvider.UtcNow
member.summary: Returns the current date and time expressed as the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
member.returns: The current date and time expressed as the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
